casebody.data:
Robert Allen SARTORI, Plaintiff,
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY; DPS Communications, Information Technology Services; George T. Solomon; Kieran J. Shanahan; American Telephone and Telgraph Co.; Global-Tel-Link Corp; and Evercom Systems Inc., Defendants. No. COA15-84. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Sept. 1, 2015.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINON

Affirmed.
